original_text: And Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands toward heaven:
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 제단 앞에서 이스라엘의 온 회중과 마주서서 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: And Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord
in the presence of all the congregation of Israel
and spread forth his hands toward heaven:
